Texts.Eng:
While dark magic is scary these tiny horses can only use light, and apparently powerful, magic, literally.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.3^reset;, Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Cosmic

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Grassy/Wooded: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;3^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Alien/Heck/Flesh: -^red;34^reset;% E. Regen, Damage & Energy x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wands: +^green;8^reset;% Defense, +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen
  Staves: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Chance
  Energy: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;:  -^red;50^reset;% Shadow, -^red;15^reset;% Radiation
  Defense x^red;0.7^reset;
